heading: Our Destinations
subtitle: From the sacred ghats of Varanasi to the futuristic skyline of Dubai, we craft journeys to destinations that inspire. Browse our curated collection and start planning your next adventure.

categories.title: India
categories.description: Discover the incredible diversity of India — ancient temples, sun-kissed beaches, misty hill stations, and vibrant cities waiting to be explored.

destinations.name: Delhi
destinations.description: A sprawling capital where Mughal-era grandeur meets modern energy — from the Red Fort to bustling Chandni Chowk.

destinations.name: Jaipur, Rajasthan
destinations.description: Royal palaces, vibrant bazaars, and majestic forts painted in the warm hues of Rajasthan.

destinations.name: Goa
destinations.description: Golden beaches, Portuguese heritage, and legendary nightlife on India's tropical west coast.

destinations.name: Kerala
destinations.description: Serene backwaters, lush hill stations, and Ayurvedic traditions in India's greenest state.

destinations.name: Varanasi
destinations.description: One of the world's oldest living cities — sacred ghats, evening aartis, and deep spiritual energy on the banks of the Ganges.

destinations.name: Leh-Ladakh
destinations.description: Breathtaking Himalayan landscapes, ancient monasteries, and some of the highest motorable roads on earth.

destinations.name: Andaman Islands
destinations.description: Pristine white-sand beaches, turquoise waters, and vibrant coral reefs in the Bay of Bengal.

categories.title: International
categories.description: Venture beyond borders with our handpicked international destinations — Southeast Asian gems, Middle Eastern marvels, and Caucasus treasures.

destinations.name: Singapore
destinations.description: A dazzling city-state where futuristic architecture, world-class dining, and lush gardens blend seamlessly.

destinations.name: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
destinations.description: A vibrant melting pot of Malay, Chinese, and Indian cultures crowned by the iconic Petronas Towers.

destinations.name: Bali, Indonesia
destinations.description: Discover tropical paradise with ancient temples, terraced rice paddies, and pristine beaches.

destinations.name: Bangkok, Thailand
destinations.description: Glittering temples, floating markets, and legendary street food in Southeast Asia's most electrifying capital.

destinations.name: Hanoi, Vietnam
destinations.description: Ancient charm meets vibrant energy — from the Old Quarter's bustling lanes to the serene waters of Ha Long Bay.

destinations.name: Baku, Azerbaijan
destinations.description: A striking blend of medieval old town and ultra-modern architecture on the shores of the Caspian Sea.

destinations.name: Tbilisi, Georgia
destinations.description: Cobblestone streets, ancient churches, and a thriving wine culture nestled between the Caucasus Mountains.

destinations.name: Muscat, Oman
destinations.description: Dramatic fjords, golden deserts, and timeless souqs in the most welcoming corner of the Arabian Peninsula.

destinations.name: Dubai, UAE
destinations.description: From the world's tallest tower to vast golden deserts — a playground of luxury and innovation.

destinations.name: Sri Lanka
destinations.description: Ancient ruins, misty tea hills, golden beaches, and abundant wildlife on a compact tropical island.

cta.heading: Don't see your dream destination?
cta.text: We specialize in crafting custom itineraries. Tell us where you want to go, and we'll make it happen.
